card.name: Brainstorm
card.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Eldritch Evolution
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

card.name: Fatal Push
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer
card.text: Whenever Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
card.text: +2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target.−X: Exile each permanent with mana value X or less that's one or more colors.−10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Unholy Heat
card.text: Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Arcbound Ravager
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Ravager.Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Ethereal Armor
card.text: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

card.name: Food
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Kwain, Itinerant Meddler
card.text: {T}: Each player may draw a card, then each player who drew a card this way gains 1 life.

card.name: Rabbit Battery
card.text: HasteEquipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.Reconfigure {R} ({R}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)Equip {1}
